title: Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Rolls (2 Packs of 6), Equivalent to 38 Regular Rolls, White
descriptions:
Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels — strong, absorbent, and easy to use.

- What you get: 12 big “Huge Rolls.” Each roll has 158 sheets. That’s like getting about 38 regular rolls in total, so they last a long time.
- Gentle but strong: 2‑ply paper towels that are soft to the touch and tough on spills.
- Soaks up more: Up to 75% more absorbent than a leading 1‑ply brand, so you use fewer sheets.
- Use only what you need: Flex‑a‑Size lets you tear off a small, medium, or large sheet. No waste.
- Easy to see, easy to match: Bright white color looks clean in any kitchen.
- Trusted quality: An Amazon Brand, similar to Bounty Paper Towels.

Simple choices:
- For a quick drip: Tear a small piece.
- For a bigger mess: Tear two or more pieces.
- For tough cleanups: Use a larger section and press—no scrubbing needed.

Why it’s a good value:
- Fewer roll changes because each roll is “Huge.”
- More absorbent means fewer sheets per spill.
- 12 rolls come in two easy-to-store packs of 6.

Great for kitchens, bathrooms, and quick cleanups anywhere in the home. If you want a paper towel that lasts longer, wastes less, and cleans better, choose Presto! Flex‑a‑Size Paper Towels.
